description: Youâ€™ve watched your favorite broadcasters play Dead by Daylight and show off their exclusive outfits, now you can finally get your hands on those amazing threads and proudly display your fandom! On top of that, 100% of Behaviour Digital's proceeds from the sale of this item will go to the Brain & Behavior Research Foundation. The Charity Case is a collection of 26 cosmetic items for many of the Dead by Daylight survivors and killers. It contains 20 brand new customization options based on your favorite broadcasters and 6 previously exclusive items from old friends.
name: Dead by Daylight: CHARITY CASE
